alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 1:30PM EDT until June 16 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHEASTERN PRINCE EDWARD COUNTIES... At 129 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sheppards, or near Farmville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Farmville and Hampden Sydney around 140 PM EDT. Longwood University around 145 PM EDT. Guinea Mills around 150 PM EDT. Rice around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kingsville, Raines Tavern, Tuggle, Reeds, Angola, Stoddert, Burkes Tavern, Moran and Hawk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
